title: Korea Unmasked
description: The Story of Korea as it was never told before! In Korea Unmasked, Won-bok Rhie tells the story of the Korean people as it has never been told before. Rhie's personal insights provide a delightful and humorous portrait of the Korean people. It is comical yet serious, well-informed but objective. If you have time for just one book on Korea, this is the one!
author: Won-bok Rhie
